name: Solo
description: Solo is an introspective puzzler set on a gorgeous and surreal archipelago. Reflect on your loving relationships by exploring contemplative, dream-like islands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: A Controller is STRONGLY recommended to play this game.
